A rat's nest. Unsound practices. Slipshod scholarship. Politics. Lamebrains and lunatics. But essential for research.
And worthwhile for the discounts on services, if nothing else. Marayn Dren here, she's not so bad. Good intentions.
And Edwinna Elbert, over in Ald'ruhn. Interesting projects. A bit out of touch, perhaps. But sound and sensible.
The Mages Guild is dedicated to the preservation and distribution of magical knowledge.
Pursue your studies diligently, outlander, and the benefits of belonging to the Mages Guild will become clear to you.
